resources.string:
MUSIC:
Retro Platforming - David Feslyan

SFX:
Sound Collection by Juhani Junkala

ART:
al_pakh_a
Reward: 500\n\nDescription: Large, frequent asteroids that look more solid than the smaller ones
Reward: 1000\n\nDescription: Invulnerable enemy ships which go after player. Once a ram misses you it gets destroyed
Reward: -\n\nDescription: This wave includes enemies from previous three waves
Reward: 5000\n\nDescription: Enemy ship that takes height and starts firing while moving left and right. After fifteen shots becomes vulnerable and changes color to white for a short period of time
Reward: 500\n\nPlayer starts shooting two projectiles at a time
